name: Anime girl Or Bottle?
description: This is a logic game with 2 modes, in one you need to find and click on all anime girls before the time runs out, and in second mode you play for anime girl and you need to collect as many bottles as possible before the time runs out.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: 1.2GHz processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Storage: 50 MB available space Additional Notes: minimum 1280x720 screen resolution
